com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download

Interface CoreBitmapDownloader.AnalyticsListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitmapDownloader.AnalyticsDisplayer
    Enclosing class:
    CoreBitmapDownloader<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable,HandlerClass extends DownloadContracts.Handlerable>

    public static interface CoreBitmapDownloader.AnalyticsListener
    When defining the CoreBitmapDownloader.ANALYTICS_LISTENER variable with an implementation of this interface, it will be notified as soon as the cache internal state changes.
    Since:
    2012.06.07

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAnalytics(CoreBitmapDownloader<?,?,?> coreBitmapDownloader, CoreBitmapDownloader.CoreAnalyticsData analyticsData)
      Is invoked every time the underlying attached CoreBitmapDownloader internal state changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onAnalytics

        void onAnalytics(CoreBitmapDownloader<?,?,?> coreBitmapDownloader,
               CoreBitmapDownloader.CoreAnalyticsData analyticsData)
        Is invoked every time the underlying attached CoreBitmapDownloader internal state changes.

        In particular, this method will be invoked when the instance cache is cleaned up, or when an OutOfMemoryError occurs.

        Parameters:
        coreBitmapDownloader - the instance involved in the internal state change
        analyticsData - the information about the instance internal state
